hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Lon Lon Tower#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Bolero of Fire# can be found in #the Market#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Side Room Near Dodongos

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Recovery Heart#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Epona's Song#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #0# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##the Market## has #1# major item.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Spirit Temple# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: It would be a shame if something... unfortunate... were to happen to you.^Have you considered saving lately?

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that in a grotto with a #spider and a cow# you will find...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: What did Zelda suggest that Link do when diplomacy didn't work?^${12 39 C7}Triforce.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #0# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Serenade of Water# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Temple of Time# chimes with the music of #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: Did you know that you only need to play the Song of Time to open the Door of Time? The Spiritual Stones are not needed.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #stable#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #the Song of Storms#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of #time#.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Right

ToT (Right).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Shadow Temple#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Sun's Song#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern GS Push Block Room

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZR (Near Domain).text: This Gossip Stone Is Dedicated to Those Who Perished Before Ganon Was Defeated.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Green Rupee# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.
